title: Christiansted National Historic Site: Donate
body: Donate       Donations to our park are used to fund a variety of projects involving Visitor Service, Interpretation, Exhibits, Publications, the management and protection of Christiansted NHS, Buck Island Reef National Monument and Salt River Bay NHP & EP. If you would like to make a donation to the park, make your check or money order payable to Christiansted National Historic Site. The mailing address for park is: Christiansted NHS, 2100 Church Street, #100, Christiansted, V.I. 00820
